caption.p: Progress of moult in Mustela nivalis nivalis in Białowieża Forest. Each bar indicates the proportion of individuals at different stages of moult, summarized for the years 2002–2017 (N = 130 observations of moulting animals). Each month was divided into 10-day periods. From the beginning of May until the end of October only brown individuals were present in the population. Percentage of brown colour refers only to the dorsal part of the weasel body (see Fig. S2 for details).
